title: For tech companies with Ukraine-based staff, fears aren't just economic - Technical.ly
content:
1. For tech companies with Ukraine-based staff, fears aren't just economic  Technical.ly
  2. How Ukrainian tech companies are handling Russia's invasion  Fast Company
  3. Ukraine’s Booming Tech Outsourcing Sector at Risk After Russian Invasion  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Daily Crunch: Overnight, Russia’s invasion puts Ukrainian tech industry on a war footing  TechCrunch

description: "I want to get our team out of harm's way," one local CEO said in discussing his Ukrainian employees. As the conflict unfolds, here's what it means for founders — and the tech industry as a whole.
